name: Ram Hide Harnesses
tooltip:
Ram Hide HarnessesLevel 60

While some of our soldiers are busy capturing wolves for the stable master, others must provide for the simple necessities that riding requires. I am speaking of riding harnesses, of course.

You must strike at the indigenous rams of the region. The very same rams that the Stormpike cavalry uses as mounts!

Slay them and return to me with their hides. Once we have gathered enough hides, we will fashion harnesses for the riders. The Frostwolf Wolf Riders will ride once more!

Requirements:
- Alterac Ram Hide
